trans-unit.source: Provides methods to write to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos para escrever um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento ou a fila de impressão.

trans-unit.source: XpsDocumentWriter has no constructor.
trans-unit.target: XpsDocumentWriter não tem nenhum construtor.

trans-unit.source: To create an XpsDocumentWriter, use the static <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class or use one of the static <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> class.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um XpsDocumentWriter, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>classe ou utilize um dos <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A>métodos para a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>classe</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> estáticos</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.CreateXpsDocumentWriter%2A> estático

trans-unit.source: The document or the queue that creates the XpsDocumentWriter becomes the target to which it writes.
trans-unit.target: O documento ou a fila que cria o XpsDocumentWriter torna-se o destino para o qual escreve.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the current <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*> operation.
trans-unit.target: Cancela atual <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*>operação.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*>

trans-unit.source: No asynchronous write operation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: Está em curso nenhuma operação de escrita assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref> that can write <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects to a document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"> </xref> que pode escrever <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> objetos para um documento ou a fila de impressão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>Escreve o mesmo destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>ou <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>como os <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>que cria <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref> that can write <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects with <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> settings to an XPS document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"> </xref> que pode escrever <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> objetos com <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> definições para um documento XPS ou a fila de impressão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> writes to the same target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> as the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>Escreve o mesmo destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>ou <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>como os <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>que cria <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `documentPrintTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método não valida ou modificar especificado `documentPrintTicket` para um determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessário, utilize o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>método para criar um <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>que é específica para o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>e válido para uma impressora especificada.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that specifies the default printing preferences for the document sequence.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> que especifica as preferências de impressão predefinidas para a sequência de documento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that represents the default printing preferences for each document.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> que representa as preferências de impressão predefinidas para cada documento.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"></xref> that writes <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> elements with <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> settings to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument"> </xref> que escreve <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> elementos com <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> definições para o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Escritas em sincronia uma determinada [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento para o destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>classe tem um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de vários documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona os <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos de origem para o conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos no destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>ou <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: This Write method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Este método de escrita será reserialize especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] um documento que irá remover todos os conteúdos a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>que não é necessário para ser preservados pelo [especificação XML Paper](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: O reserialization removerá também todas as extensões do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>markup, incluindo quaisquer expandido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: By design this Write method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição não chame este método de escrita de <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do documento de origem.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously paginated content from a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Escreve o conteúdo de forma síncrona paginated de uma determinada <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"> </xref> ao destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a pointer to unpaginated source material and also contains methods for paginating the material.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que contém um ponteiro para o material de origem unpaginated e também contém métodos para paginating o material.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Escritas em sincronia uma determinada <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref> ao destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>classe tem um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de vários documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> to the set.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ao conjunto.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: A document that is written to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um documento que foi escrito para o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Escritas em sincronia uma determinada <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"> </xref> ao destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>classe tem um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de vários documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements to the existing set.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos para o conjunto existente.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: A set of documents that is written to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um conjunto de documentos que são escritos para o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Escritas em sincronia uma determinada <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref> ao destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A page that is written to the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma página que é escrita o <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Escritas em sincronia uma determinada <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> ao destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To batch write a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, use <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Para escrever o lote um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>Utilize <xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.VisualsToXpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> that is written.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> que foi escrito.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Escritas em sincronia uma determinada [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento para o destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copies the serialized[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Quando `notificationLevel` estiver desativada, o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>copia o serializados[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento para o destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>ou <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>que criados <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output.
trans-unit.target: Quando `notificationLevel` estiver ativada, o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>deserializes primeiro o documento, junto reserializes-lo e, em seguida, escreve-o de destino com notificações de progresso como cada página é de saída.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>classe tem um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de vários documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the sequence of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona os <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos de origem para a sequência de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos no destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>ou <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>, notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed.
trans-unit.target: Se `notificationLevel` está especificado como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>, as notificações são produzidas apenas quando o documento é serializado, não impresso.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: To receive notifications the document must be reserialized.
trans-unit.target: Para receber notificações, tem de ser reserialized o documento.

trans-unit.source: When a document is reserialized all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed.
trans-unit.target: Quando um documento é reserialized todos os conteúdos a partir do <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>que não é necessário para ser preservados pelo [especificação de documento XML (XPS)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) é removido.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: O reserialization removerá também todas as extensões do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>markup, incluindo quaisquer expandido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel> the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed.
trans-unit.target: Se `notificationLevel` está especificado como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>o documento não será possível reserialized e qualquer conteúdo expandido será mantido, mesmo quando foram impressas.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: By design this Write method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição não chame este método de escrita de <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do documento de origem.

trans-unit.source: An indication of whether notification is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Uma indicação de se notificação está ativada.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously paginated content from a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> together with a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Escreve o conteúdo de forma síncrona paginated de uma determinada <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"> </xref> em conjunto com um <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> ao destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método não valida ou modificar especificado `printTicket` para um determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessário, utilize o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>método para criar um <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>que é específica para o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>e é válido para uma impressora especificada.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains a pointer to unpaginated source material and also contains methods for paginating the material.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que contém um ponteiro para o material de origem unpaginated e também contém métodos para paginating o material.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that represents the default printing preferences for material.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> que representa as preferências de impressão predefinidas para o material.

trans-unit.source: Writes synchronously a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> together with a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Escritas de forma síncrona um <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref> em conjunto com um <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> ao destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.

trans-unit.source: This WriteAsync method will reserialize the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document which will remove all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Este método WriteAsync será reserialize especificado [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] um documento que irá remover todos os conteúdos a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>que não é necessário para ser preservados pelo [especificação XML Paper](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: O reserialization removerá também todas as extensões do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>markup, incluindo quaisquer expandido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: By design this WriteAsync method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição não chame este método WriteAsync o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>

trans-unit.source: Writes asynchronously a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document with notification option to the target <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Escreve no modo assíncrono uma determinada [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento com a opção de notificação para o destino <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Printing.PrintQueue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is disabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> copies the serialized [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] document to the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> that created the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Quando `notificationLevel` estiver desativada, o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>copia o serializados [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] documento para o destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>ou <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>que criados <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: When `notificationLevel` is enabled, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> first deserializes the document, next reserializes it, and then writes it to the target with progress notifications as each page is output.
trans-unit.target: Quando `notificationLevel` estiver ativada, o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>deserializes primeiro o documento, junto reserializes-lo e, em seguida, escreve-o de destino com notificações de progresso como cada página é de saída.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> class has a singular name, an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> can be one <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of multiple documents.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>classe tem um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de vários documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the source to the sequence of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements in the target <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona os <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos de origem para a sequência de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos no destino <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>ou <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>, notifications are produced only when the document is serialized, not printed.
trans-unit.target: Se `notificationLevel` está especificado como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>, as notificações são produzidas apenas quando o documento é serializado, não impresso.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: To receive notifications the document must be reserialized.
trans-unit.target: Para receber notificações, tem de ser reserialized o documento.

trans-unit.source: When a document is reserialized all content from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> that is not required to be preserved by the [XML Paper Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) is removed.
trans-unit.target: Quando um documento é reserialized todos os conteúdos a partir do <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>que não é necessário para ser preservados pelo [especificação XML Paper](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) é removido.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: The reserialization will also remove all extensions from the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> markup, including any extended [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: O reserialization removerá também todas as extensões do <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>markup, incluindo quaisquer expandido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>

trans-unit.source: If `notificationLevel` is specified as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel> the document will not be reserialized and any extended content will be preserved, even when printed.
trans-unit.target: Se `notificationLevel` está especificado como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>o documento não será possível reserialized e qualquer conteúdo expandido será mantido, mesmo quando foram impressas.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentNotificationLevel>

trans-unit.source: By design this WriteAsync method does not call the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired> event.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição não chame este método WriteAsync o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired>

trans-unit.source: The path of the source document.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do documento de origem.

trans-unit.source: An indication of whether notification is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Uma indicação de se notificação está ativada.

trans-unit.source: The data that is written includes a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> and additional information that the caller wants to pass to an event handler.
trans-unit.target: Os dados que são escritos incluem um <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>e informações adicionais que o autor da chamada de advogados pretende passar para um processador de eventos.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>classe tem um nome único, um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de vários documentos.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> or a set of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> elements to the existing sequence.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>ou um conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>elementos para a sequência existente.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>

trans-unit.source: This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Este método não valida ou modificar especificado `printTicket` para um determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Se necessário, utilize o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>método para criar um <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>que é específica para o <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>e é válido para uma impressora especificada.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: The set of documents to be written.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> que representa as preferências de impressão predefinidas para o conjunto de documentos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before a <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write*> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync*> method adds a <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> to a document or print queue.
trans-unit.target: Imediatamente antes de ocorrer um <> </> *> ou <> </> *> método adiciona um <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref> para um documento ou a fila de impressão.

trans-unit.source: WritingPrintTicketRequired enables an event handler to substitute a new <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for the one that is passed to the write operation.
trans-unit.target: WritingPrintTicketRequired permite que um processador de eventos substituir um novo <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>para o que é transmitido para a operação de escrita.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: The following four <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A> methods do not call the WritingPrintTicketRequired event: - <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.Write%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md XpsDocumentNotificationLevel) - <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>(String) - <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WriteAsync%2A>(String, XpsDocumentNotificationLevel)
